body_html:
Hello, the solution by @shingte doesn't solves this problem for me. Any more ideas on what to do?

I am seeing
2017-12-06 23:54:30.748791: E C:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\rel-win\M\windows-gpu\PY\35\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_blas.cc:366] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED

2017-12-06 23:54:30.751215: E C:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\rel-win\M\windows-gpu\PY\35\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_blas.cc:366] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
2017-12-06 23:54:30.751469: E C:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\rel-win\M\windows-gpu\PY\35\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_blas.cc:366] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED

2017-12-06 23:54:30.751823: E C:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\rel-win\M\windows-gpu\PY\35\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_blas.cc:366] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
